scripts.install-node: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm run install
scripts.install-electron: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=electron npm run install
scripts.install-aws: rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=aws npm run install
scripts.install-web: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=web npm run install
scripts.install-cordova: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=cordova npm run install
scripts.npmpack: npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-platforms-2.1.44.tgz && npx shx cp -rL package/** ../../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms/ && npx rimraf package
